game.name: Perk Up
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 앱 내 구매, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Perk Up! is a multiplayer deck-building fighting game where every defeat makes you stronger. Each time you fall, you gain new powers, evolving into an unstoppable force. Keep fighting, adapt, and outlast everyone to become the last one standing!
